+---------------------------+---------+-----------+---------------+--------------------------------+
| id                        | estRows | task      | access object | operator info                  |
+---------------------------+---------+-----------+---------------+--------------------------------+
| Delete_4                  | N/A     | root      |               | N/A                            |
| └─TableReader_8           | 0.00    | root      |               | data:Selection_7               |
